info.name: fo_117_verify_to_create_payment
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to create payment (gen QR) & hook payment

###### Testcase:

1. Login (F1)
    
2. Get data
    
    1. client / get list client => get 1 client to action
        
    2. transaction / get list transaction => get total
        
    3. account / get list va => get 1 va to action
        
    4. \[BIDV only\] account / get master account => get BIDV master account (\*2)
        
    5. ledger_coa / get list coa => get coa account_receivable
        
    6. ledger_account / get list payment account => update account_id for va_obj
        
    7. ledger_txn / get list ledger txn => get total
        
    8. ledger_posting / get list posting => get list posting
        
    9. payment / get list payment -> ghi nhận danh sách payment ban đầu
        
3. Create payment
    
4. Check data
    
    1. account / get list va
        
    2. payment / get list payment sau khi create payment: increase 1
        
    3. payment / get payment detail => check data
        
5. hook payment (hook đầu bank để tạo thanh toán)
    
6. Check data
    
    1. payment/ get list payment sau khi hook data : update payment status, amount
        
    2. payment / get payment detail => check status update
        
    3. transaction / get list => increase 1
        
    4. transaction / get detail => data correctly
        
    5. ledger_account / get list payment account => update balance amout
        
    6. ledger_tnx / get list ledger tnx => mapping data only
        
    7. ledger_posting / get list posting => increase (2/4) records with correct data
        
7. hook to client (bonus) => manual check on Lark setting (\*)
    

###### Note:

- (\*) setting lúc update client webhhook_url
    
- (\*2) chưa support BIDV
